name: Cinematic Realism
description: Photorealistic style that mimics traditional film cinematography with natural lighting, realistic proportions, and authentic human expressions. Ideal for dramatic narratives and character-driven stories.

name: Animation
description: Stylized animated aesthetic suitable for both 2D and 3D animation styles. Features vibrant colors, exaggerated expressions, and artistic interpretation over photorealism.

name: Film Noir
description: Classic black and white aesthetic with high contrast lighting, dramatic shadows, and moody atmosphere. Perfect for mystery, crime, and dramatic narratives.

name: Sci-Fi
description: Futuristic aesthetic featuring advanced technology, sleek designs, neon lighting, and otherworldly environments. Ideal for science fiction narratives.

name: Fantasy
description: Magical and mythical aesthetic featuring enchanted environments, mystical creatures, and otherworldly elements. Perfect for fantasy and adventure narratives.
